items.title: Voltage Regulator MCP1700
items.subtitle: Low quiescent current LDO

seo.description: MCP1700 low dropout voltage regulator offering stable output voltage with minimal dropout. Ideal for battery-powered and low voltage applications.
seo.keywords: MCP1700, MCP1700-3302E, voltage-regulator, low-dropout, linear regulator, stable output, low quiescent current, TO92

items.content:
The MCP1700 is a low dropout (LDO) voltage regulator manufactured by Microchip Technology. It's designed to provide a stable output voltage with minimal dropout voltage, making it ideal for applications requiring precise voltage regulation even when the input voltage is close to the output voltage.

Low Dropout Voltage
The MCP1700 has a very low dropout voltage, typically around 178mV at full load and room temperature, allowing it to regulate output voltage even when the input voltage is very close to the desired output voltage.

Wide Input Voltage Range
It can accept a wide range of input voltages, from 2.3V to 6.0V, making it suitable for various battery-powered and low voltage applications.

Fixed and Adjustable Output Voltage Options
The MCP1700 is available in fixed output voltage versions ranging from 1.2V to 5.0V, as well as an adjustable version that allows the output voltage to be set anywhere between 1.22V and 5.5V using external resistors.

Low Quiescent Current
It has a low quiescent current, typically around 1.6µA, which minimizes power consumption and extends battery life in battery-powered applications.

Stable Output
The MCP1700 provides a stable output voltage with low output voltage noise and excellent load and line regulation characteristics.

Shutdown Mode
Some versions of the MCP1700 feature a shutdown mode, allowing the regulator to be disabled to conserve power when not in use.

Overall, the MCP1700 is a versatile and reliable voltage regulator suitable for a wide range of applications, including battery-powered devices, sensor modules, portable gadgets, and more. Its low dropout voltage, wide input voltage range, and low quiescent current make it an excellent choice for applications where efficiency and precision are critical.

items.title: Micro SD Card Module
items.subtitle: SPI interface

seo.description: Micro SD Card Module with SPI interface to add external storage capabilities to microcontroller projects. Compatible with Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and more.
seo.keywords: micro SD, TF card, module, arduino, SPI, external storage, microcontroller, MCU

images.alt: Micro SD Card Module - Top view
Micro SD Card Module - Bottom view
Micro SD Card Module - Top view with dimensions

items.content: The Micro SD Card Module with SPI interface offers a convenient solution for adding external storage capabilities to various microcontroller projects. Utilizing the Serial Peripheral Interface (SPI) protocol, this module enables seamless communication between the microcontroller and the microSD card, facilitating fast and efficient data transfer.
peculiarities: SPI Interface: The module's SPI interface allows it to be used with a wide range of microcontroller platforms that support SPI communication, including Arduino, Raspberry Pi, ESP32, STM32, and more.
Universal Compatibility: Compatible with standard microSD cards, the module supports various storage capacities and brands, making it versatile for different project requirements.

Easy Integration: With its simple interface and compact design, the module can be easily integrated into a variety of projects, from data logging and sensor applications to multimedia playback and IoT devices.

Reliable Performance: Designed for reliability and stability, the module provides consistent performance in reading and writing data to the microSD card, ensuring seamless operation in diverse applications.

Wide Range of Applications: Suitable for a multitude of applications beyond microcontroller projects, including digital cameras, audio recorders, GPS devices, and more, the module offers versatile storage solutions for various electronic devices.

items.title: CD74HC4067 Breakout Board
items.subtitle: HP4067 16-channel analog mux/demux

seo.description: CD74HC4067 breakout board for simplify integration analog multiplexer/demultiplexer chip into electronic circuits. Ideal for expanding analog input/output capabilities.
seo.keywords: CD74HC4067, HP4067, module, 16-channel, analog, breakout board, multiplexer/demultiplexer, mux/demux

items.content: The CD74HC4067 module is an analog multiplexer/demultiplexer designed to facilitate the selection and routing of analog signals in electronic circuits. Developed by Texas Instruments, the CD74HC4067 module provides a straightforward solution for expanding the number of analog inputs or outputs available to microcontrollers or other digital devices.
peculiarities: Multiple Analog Channels: The CD74HC4067 module offers a total of 16 analog input/output channels, which can be selectively connected to a single analog input/output pin using the built-in multiplexer/demultiplexer functionality.
High-Speed Operation: The CD74HC4067 module operates at high speed, allowing for rapid switching between different analog channels without introducing significant delay or latency.

Digital Control Interface: The CD74HC4067 module communicates with microcontrollers and other digital devices via a standard digital interface (e.g., SPI or I2C), enabling easy control and configuration of the multiplexer/demultiplexer settings.

Wide Voltage Range: The CD74HC4067 module supports a wide voltage range, making it compatible with a variety of analog input/output signals and voltage levels commonly encountered in electronic circuits.
Low Power Consumption: Designed for low power operation, the CD74HC4067 module consumes minimal power during operation, making it suitable for battery-powered and portable devices.

items.title: Nichicon ES Electrolytic Capacitors
items.subtitle: Bi-polarized for HiFi audio

seo.description: Nichicon ES Bipolar Electrolytic Capacitors: Reliable components for circuits requiring bidirectional voltage handling. Ideal for audio, motor control, and crossover networks.
seo.keywords: Nichicon ES, bi-polarized, bipolar, non-polar, electrolytic, audio capacitor, HiFI audio

items.content:
Introducing Nichicon ES Bipolar Electrolytic Capacitors, essential components designed for specific applications where bi-polar characteristics are required. Unlike standard electrolytic capacitors, Nichicon ES Bipolar capacitors are capable of handling both positive and negative voltages, making them ideal for circuits where voltage reversal may occur.

AC Signal Coupling
In audio equipment and amplifier circuits, where AC signals are present, Nichicon ES Bipolar capacitors are used for coupling signals while blocking DC offset. Their bi-polar nature allows them to pass both positive and negative AC signals without distortion, ensuring accurate signal transmission.

AC Motor Applications
In motor control circuits, where reversing the motor direction is necessary, Nichicon ES Bipolar capacitors are employed to handle the bidirectional voltage spikes generated during motor operation. Their ability to withstand voltage reversal protects the circuitry and ensures reliable motor control.

Crossover Networks
In speaker crossover networks, where signals are split into high and low frequencies, Nichicon ES Bipolar capacitors are used to block DC components while allowing AC signals to pass. Their bi-polar characteristics enable seamless integration into crossover designs, maintaining signal integrity.

Energy Storage
In circuits requiring energy storage with bidirectional voltage swings, such as in pulse circuits or power factor correction, Nichicon ES Bipolar capacitors provide efficient energy storage and voltage buffering. Their ability to handle both positive and negative voltages ensures stable operation in dynamic environments.

Reliability
With Nichicon's reputation for quality and reliability, ES Bipolar capacitors offer excellent performance and longevity. They are designed to withstand demanding operating conditions and provide consistent performance over time.

items.title: High Frequency Electrolytic Capacitors
items.subtitle: Low resistance (ESR)

seo.description: High-frequency electrolytic capacitors with low ESR for efficient energy storage and stable performance in electronic circuits demanding rapid voltage changes and high frequencies.
seo.keywords: electrolytic, aluminum, capacitor, high frequency, low ESR, low resistance

items.content: Introducing high-frequency electrolytic capacitors with low Equivalent Series Resistance (ESR), essential components for applications demanding efficient energy storage and stable performance at high frequencies. These capacitors are specifically designed to minimize ESR, enabling them to handle rapid voltage changes and high-frequency signals with minimal loss. Ideal for power supply filtering, decoupling, and voltage regulation in electronic circuits, they ensure reliable operation and optimal performance, even in demanding environments.

items.title: Aluminum Electrolytic Capacitors
items.subtitle: Efficient energy storage and voltage regulation

seo.description: Aluminum electrolytic capacitors for efficient energy storage and voltage regulation in electronic circuits.
seo.keywords: electrolytic, capacitor, aluminum, energy storage, decoupling capacitors

items.content:
Aluminum electrolytic capacitors are a type of electrolytic capacitor that utilizes aluminum oxide as the dielectric material. These capacitors are widely used in electronic circuits due to their high capacitance values and relatively low cost compared to other capacitor types. They are polarized, meaning they must be connected in a specific orientation in the circuit to function properly.

Aluminum electrolytic capacitors are commonly used in power supply circuits, audio equipment, and other applications where large capacitance values and high voltage ratings are required. They are particularly effective for smoothing and filtering DC voltage, as well as for decoupling and bypassing in electronic circuits.

Despite their advantages, aluminum electrolytic capacitors have limitations such as relatively high Equivalent Series Resistance (ESR) and limited lifetime compared to other capacitor types. However, advancements in technology have led to improvements in performance and reliability over the years.

Overall, aluminum electrolytic capacitors are indispensable components in electronic design, providing efficient energy storage and voltage regulation in a wide range of applications.

items.content: Introducing the THAT1512, an exceptional analog audio preamplifier integrated circuit meticulously engineered by THAT Corporation. Designed to meet the rigorous demands of professional audio applications, the THAT1512 boasts unparalleled performance and precision.
peculiarities: Low Noise: Experience pristine audio signals with minimal interference, thanks to the THAT1512's ultra-low noise design, ensuring crystal-clear audio reproduction.
High Dynamic Range: Enjoy a wide dynamic range that faithfully captures the full spectrum of audio signals, from subtle nuances to powerful peaks, without sacrificing quality.
Precision Gain Control: Fine-tune your audio levels with precision using the integrated gain control feature, allowing for meticulous adjustment to suit your specific application requirements.
Wide Bandwidth: With its broad bandwidth response, the THAT1512 delivers consistent fidelity across the entire audio frequency range, ensuring accurate reproduction of sound.

Reliable Performance: Built to withstand the demands of professional audio environments, the THAT1512 offers robust construction and dependable performance, ensuring consistent operation under challenging conditions.

Seamless Integration: Designed for easy integration into a variety of audio systems, the THAT1512 simplifies the development process and streamlines implementation, making it an ideal choice for both new and existing setups.

items.title: Hi-Link A0515S-2WR3
items.subtitle: DC-DC 5V to ±15V, 2W

seo.description: Discover the Hi-Link A0515S-2WR3: compact, efficient, and reliable DC/DC power supply modules designed for on-board systems. With constant voltage output, input isolation, and dual outputs, these modules cater to diverse applications, ensuring stable power delivery in automotive, industrial, and embedded systems
seo.keywords: 0515, A0515S-2WR3, hi-link, power, dc-dc, dual-outputs, 5V, 15V, 2W

items.content:
The Hi-Link AxxxxS-2WR3 series represents a compact and highly efficient solution for micro power applications, delivering constant voltage with input isolation and unregulated dual output DC/DC power supply modules.

Designed by Hi-Link, these modules cater to the specific requirements of on-board power supply systems, offering reliability and versatility. With a focus on small size and high efficiency, they are ideal for applications demanding isolated voltage outputs from the input power source.

Overload Protection

Under normal operating conditions, the output circuit of this product does not provide overload protection. Prolonged overload conditions will trigger over-temperature protection, leading to output shutdown.

Output Short-Circuit Protection

The product provides sustainable short-circuit protection with automatic recovery.

Caution Regarding External Capacitors

The capacitance value of externally connected capacitors should not be too large, as it may lead to over-current or poor startup performance during module initialization.
items.warningContent:
It is advisable to avoid operating the module under no-load conditions. If the actual power consumption of the load is less than 10% of the module's rated output power, or if there is a no-load condition, it is recommended to externally connect a dummy load (resistor) at the output. The value of the dummy load (resistor) can be calculated as 5-10% of the module's rated power, with the resistance value equal to R = Uout / (W * 10%).

So, you would need a resistor with a value of approximately 112.5 Ohms. Since standard resistor values come in discrete steps, you would typically choose the nearest standard resistor value, such as 110 Ohms or 120 Ohms, depending on availability.

If the product operates below the minimum required load, the performance of the product may not meet all the performance indicators specified in the datasheet.

items.title: WeAct USB Logic Analyzer
items.subtitle: 8-channel 24MHz for each

seo.description: WeAct LogicAnalyzerV1 offers powerful logic analysis capabilities with its Cypress/Corebai USB controller. Capture data from 8 channels simultaneously at a maximum sampling rate of 24MHz, supporting logic levels up to 5.5V. Compatible with sigrok-PulseView software for open-source protocol analysis on Linux, Windows, and Mac OS X
seo.keywords: logic analyzer, WeAct, cypress, corebai, 8-channel, 24MHz, logic level analysis, protocol analysis

items.content:
WeAct Logic Analyzer V1 is a powerful logic analyzer built around the Cypress/Corebai USB controller. With the capability to simultaneously capture 8-channels of data. Each channel boasts a maximum sampling rate of 24MHz, accommodating rapid data acquisition. Supporting logic levels of up to 5.5V, it ensures compatibility with a wide range of devices.

The software, powered by sigrok-PulseView, is open-source and compatible with Linux, Windows, Mac OS X, and other platforms, providing flexibility for users across different operating systems. With support for over 100 protocol analyses and the ability to customize protocols, it empowers users to delve into intricate data analysis tailored to their specific needs.

items.title: CH224K USB-PD Sink Controller
items.subtitle: up to 100W

seo.description: Discover the CH224 chip, a versatile solution integrating USB PD3.0/2.0, BC1.2, and up to 100W power support. With automatic VCONN detection and E-Mark chip emulation, it's ideal for high-power input expansion in wireless chargers, electric toothbrushes, and more.
seo.keywords: CH224, CH224K, 100W, USB-PD3.0, USB-PD2.0, USB Type-C PD, BC1.2, VCONN, high-power, power management, fast-charging, ESSOP10

items.content:
Introducing the CH224, a versatile solution that seamlessly integrates multiple fast charging protocols, including USB PD3.0/2.0 and BC1.2. This advanced chip boasts automatic detection of VCONN and emulation of E-Mark chips, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of devices. With support for up to 100W power, the CH224 is equipped to handle high-power input requirements effortlessly.

Featuring a built-in PD communication module, the CH224 offers exceptional integration and streamlined peripherals. It includes essential functions such as output voltage detection, as well as over-temperature and over-voltage protection, guaranteeing safe and reliable operation.

Ideal for various electronic applications, the CH224 finds its place in expanding high-power input scenarios. Whether in wireless chargers, electric toothbrushes, rechargeable shavers, lithium battery power tools, or other devices, the CH224 delivers unmatched performance and versatility, making it a preferred choice for demanding power management needs.
items.warningContent:
For CH224K, the input voltage on CFG2/CFG3 cannot be higher than 3.7V. For CH224D, the input voltage on CFG2/CFG3 cannot be higher than 5V.

In scenarios where back-end circuits, such as MCUs, exhibit slow startup or MCU pins default to a specific state, the CFG1 pin on the CH224K/CH224D may remain in a floating state or IO configuration mode until the MCU becomes operational. This could potentially trigger a 20V request. To mitigate this, if the system cannot tolerate a 20V input, it's advisable to add a configuration resistor to the CFG1 pin. This ensures that the CH224K/CH224D can request an appropriate voltage by configuring the resistor before the MCU initialization process begins.

externalLinks.name: Easy PD Sink using MCU CH32V003 and PD chip CH224K

items.title: CH32V003
items.subtitle: General-purpose MCU 32-bit RISC-V

seo.description: CH32V003 industrial-grade RISC-V microcontroller with 48MHz main frequency, wide voltage support, low power consumption, and integrated peripherals including ADCs, op-amp comparators, and communication interfaces.
seo.keywords: CH32V003, CH32V003J4M6, SOP8, 32-bit, 48MHz, general-purpose, MCU, RISC-V

items.content: Discover the CH32V003 series, a lineup of industrial-grade general-purpose microcontrollers built on the robust QingKe RISC-V2A core design. With a 48MHz system main frequency, wide voltage support, and ultra-small package, these microcontrollers offer reliable performance in diverse industrial applications. Equipped with a range of integrated features including DMA controllers, 10-bit ADCs, op-amp comparators, and standard communication interfaces like USART, I2C, and SPI, the CH32V003 series delivers versatile functionality while maintaining low-power consumption. Explore the power and flexibility of the CH32V003 series for your next embedded project.

items.title: Development Board Kit CH32V003
items.subtitle: General-purpose MCU 32-bit RISC-V

seo.description: Explore the CH32V003 Evaluation Development Board Kit, featuring the CH32V003F4P6 board, WCH-LinkE interface, and five CH32V003F4P6 chips in TSSOP20 packaging. Ideal for prototyping and testing, this kit offers a comprehensive platform for evaluating the capabilities of the CH32V003 microcontroller
seo.keywords: CH32V003, CH32V003F4P6, WCH-LinkE, development-board, prototyping, general-purpose, MCU, RISC-V

items.content:
The Evaluation Development Board Kit CH32V003 includes essential components for exploring the capabilities of the CH32V003 microcontroller. This comprehensive kit comprises the 1x CH32V003F4P6 board, the 1x WCH-LinkE interface, and 5x CH32V003F4P6 chips in TSSOP20 packaging.

The CH32V003F4P6 board serves as the primary platform for prototyping and testing various applications. It provides ample connectivity options and interfaces, enabling users to interface with peripherals and sensors seamlessly. With its compact design and robust construction, the board facilitates rapid development and evaluation of embedded systems.

The WCH-LinkE interface module allows for easy communication between the CH32V003F4P6 board and a computer. Utilizing this interface, developers can upload firmware, debug code, and monitor the system's performance conveniently.

Additionally, the kit includes five CH32V003F4P6 chips in TSSOP-20 packaging. These microcontrollers feature advanced capabilities, including high-speed processing, versatile I/O options, and low-power operation. With multiple chips included in the kit, developers have the flexibility to experiment with different configurations and applications.

Open source development environment for CH32V003

items.title: Annular Common Mode Inductor
items.subtitle: High current filter inductor

seo.description: Annular Common Mode Filter Inductor suppresses common mode noise and EMI, ensuring signal integrity and reducing interference in power supplies, communication lines, and electronic systems.
seo.keywords: inductor, common mode choke, EMI filter, filter inductor, ring inductor, high current inductor

items.content:
The Annular Common Mode Filter Inductor is a crucial component in electronic circuits designed to suppress common mode noise and electromagnetic interference (EMI). These inductors are commonly used in power supply lines, signal lines, and data communication systems to enhance signal integrity and reduce interference.

Common Mode Noise Suppression
Effectively attenuates common mode noise, improving the overall performance and reliability of electronic systems.

Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) Reduction
Minimizes EMI, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and reducing potential interference with other electronic devices.

Compact Annular Design
The annular (ring-shaped) design provides efficient magnetic coupling and high inductance in a compact form factor, making it suitable for space-constrained applications.

High Current Handling
Capable of handling high current levels, making them ideal for use in power supply lines and high-current circuits.

Applications of Annular Common Mode Filter Inductors include power supplies, data communication lines, audio and video equipment, automotive electronics, and industrial control systems. These inductors play a critical role in maintaining signal integrity and reducing noise in electronic circuits.

items.title: SMD Power Inductor CD54
items.subtitle: Inductance ±20%

seo.description: Elevate your electronic designs with the compact and efficient Power Inductor CD54. Perfect for power supplies, converters, and voltage regulators, it ensures stable and reliable power delivery with precision and efficiency.
seo.keywords: inductor, power inductor, CD54, SMD, filtering, noise reduction, voltage regulation

items.content:
Elevate your electronic designs with the Power Inductor CD54, a crucial component for efficient power management. Whether you're designing power supplies, DC-DC converters, or voltage regulators, this inductor ensures stable and reliable power delivery. With its ability to store energy, filter out noise, and regulate voltage levels, the CD54 is indispensable for achieving optimal performance in your circuits.

Filtering and Smoothing: Inductors are commonly used in conjunction with capacitors to form low-pass, high-pass, or band-pass filters. These filters remove unwanted frequencies or noise from signals, ensuring a smoother and cleaner output.

Energy Storage: Inductors store energy in the form of a magnetic field when current flows through them. This stored energy can be released when the current decreases, acting as a source of energy for the circuit and smoothing out voltage fluctuations.

DC-DC Conversion: Inductors play a crucial role in DC-DC converters by storing and transferring energy efficiently. They help regulate voltage levels, step up or step down voltage, and improve power conversion efficiency.

Impedance Matching: Inductors are used in impedance matching circuits to ensure maximum power transfer between components, especially in RF circuits and antenna systems.

Magnetic Coupling: Inductors can be used in transformers to transfer energy from one circuit to another while maintaining electrical isolation. This is commonly used in power distribution systems and voltage regulation.
